title: Ten Yen
description: Perhaps the greatest desire of all people is for love. This is a love story between Joumi and Amaya, turbulent and difficult--demonstrating how love overcomes barriers, and how love is a mystery that ultimately deepens people. Set in Japan in the aftermath of WW II, it accurately describes the struggles of a defeated people from their point of view.It is the prequel to Ten Yen True.
author: Christina St. Clair
